meanings.sent1: The conger swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The conger fish told a joke to the clownfish.
meanings.sent4: The conger fish stood out in the sea like a king among minnows.
meanings.sent5: The conger's sleek body glided through the water effortlessly.

meanings.sent1: She tried to conger her friend into believing a tall tale.
meanings.sent2: He was caught trying to conger his way out of trouble.
meanings.sent3: The magician congered the audience with his disappearing act.
meanings.sent4: The con artist could conger anyone with his smooth talk.
meanings.sent5: The fox used its cunning to conger the rabbit out of its burrow.
